scripts.test: npm run unit && npm run e2e
scripts.dev-publish-2s3: rm -rf dev-release     && ELECTRON_MIRROR=http://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ && npm run buildVersion dev     qaApi     && npm run build && build --config electron-builder-dev.json     --mac --win --publish always
scripts.qa-release: rm -rf  qa-release     && ELECTRON_MIRROR=http://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ && npm run buildVersion qa      qaApi     && npm run build && build --config electron-builder-qa.json      --mac --win --publish never
scripts.qa-publish-2s3: rm -rf  qa-release     && ELECTRON_MIRROR=http://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ && npm run buildVersion qa      qaApi     && npm run build && build --config electron-builder-qa.json      --mac --win --publish always
scripts.qa-publish-win-2s3: rm -rf  qa-release     && ELECTRON_MIRROR=http://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ && npm run buildVersion qa      qaApi     && npm run build && build --config electron-builder-qa.json            --win --publish always
scripts.stable-release: rm -rf  stable-release && ELECTRON_MIRROR=http://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ && npm run buildVersion stable  stableApi && npm run build && build --config electron-builder-stable.json  --mac --win --publish never
scripts.stable-publish-2s3: rm -rf  stable-release && ELECTRON_MIRROR=http://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ && npm run buildVersion stable  stableApi && npm run build && build --config electron-builder-stable.json  --mac --win --publish always
scripts.stable-release333: ELECTRON_MIRROR=http://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ && npm run buildVersion && npm run build && build --mac --win --publish never
scripts.stable-release-mac: ELECTRON_MIRROR=http://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ && npm run buildVersion && npm run build && build --mac --publish never
scripts.stable-publish-2s3333: ELECTRON_MIRROR=http://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ && npm run buildVersion && rm -rf release && npm run build && build --mac --win --publish always
scripts.stable-publish-win-2s3: ELECTRON_MIRROR=http://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ && npm run buildVersion && rm -rf release && npm run build && build --win --publish always
scripts.stable-vk-release: ELECTRON_MIRROR=http://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ && npm run buildVersion && npm run build && build --config electron-builder-vk.json --mac --win --publish never
